TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentDisposition extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi ContentDisposition extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MIME 协议 Content-Disposition 标头。

span.span: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Disposition header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当电子邮件发送到其目标时，类中的信息会附带包含附件的电子邮件。The information in the class accompanies an email message that contains attachments when the email message is sent to its destination. 中的信息 可由显示电子邮件的软件用来以发送方预期的方式显示电子邮件附件。The information in can be used by software that displays email to present the email attachments in the manner intended by the sender. 电子邮件使用类的实例创建 。Email messages are created using instances of the class. 类的实例 用于将附件添加到电子邮件中。Instances of the class are used to add attachments to email messages. 若要修改 附件的，请从属性获取实例 。To modify the for an attachment, get the instance from the property. 作为消息正文的一部分显示的内容具有处置类型 。Content to be displayed as part of the message body has the disposition type of . 不显示但附加在单独文件中的内容具有处置类型 。Content that is not displayed but is attached in a separate file has the disposition type of . 使用 属性可控制与实例关联的附件的处置类型 。Use the property to control the disposition type for the attachment associated with an instance of . 对于文件附件，你可以使用的属性 来设置文件大小，以及文件的创建日期、上次读取时间和上次修改日期。For file attachments, you can use the properties of the to set the file size, as well as the date the file was created, last read, and last modified. 对于所有附件，如果附件存储在接收计算机上，则可以设置建议的文件名。For all attachments, you can set a recommended file name in the event that the attachment is stored on the receiving computer. 方法返回内容处置标头。The method returns the Content-Disposition header. 内容处置标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍 [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/) 。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一封电子邮件，其中包含要以内联方式显示的附件。The following code example creates an email message with an attachment to be displayed inline. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于通过电子邮件发送的文件发送时间戳信息。The property is used to send time stamp information with a file being sent in an email message. 此值设置通过电子邮件发送的内容处置标头中的 Creation-Date 参数。This value sets the Creation-Date parameter in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email. 类用于撰写电子邮件。The class is used to compose an email message. 类用于将文件附加到电子邮件。The class is used to attach a file to an email message. 若要设置 ，请 从属性获取附件的 。To set , get the for the attachment from the property. 内容处置标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍 [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/) 。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property. span.span: Gets or sets the disposition type for an email attachment.
A that contains the disposition type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值可由显示电子邮件的软件用来确定提供电子邮件附件的正确方式。The property value can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 当用户打开电子邮件时，通常会显示附件。 attachments are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 通常，在用户执行某个操作（例如单击表示附件的图标）之前，附件通常不会打开。 attachments are usually not opened until the user performs some action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 内容处置标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍 [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/) 。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#24)]

summary.span: 获取或设置电子邮件附件的建议文件名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the suggested file name for an email attachment.
A that contains the file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许发件人建议用于在收件人计算机上存储电子邮件附件的名称。The property allows the sender to suggest the name to be used to store an email attachment on the recipient's computer. 此名称仅为建议，接收系统可以将其忽略。This name is a suggestion only; the receiving system can ignore it. 名称不能包含路径信息;接收计算机将忽略任何此类信息。The name must not include path information; any such information is ignored by the receiving computer. 若要删除文件名信息，可以将此属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) 。To remove file name information, you can set this property to `null` or the empty string (""). 内容处置标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍 [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/) 。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值确定电子邮件附件的处置类型（内联或附件）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the disposition type (Inline or Attachment) for an email attachment.

value.span: 如果附件中的内容以内联方式显示为电子邮件正文的一部分，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if content in the attachment is presented inline as part of the email body; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置随电子邮件一起发送的内容处置标头中的处置类型。The property sets the disposition type in the Content-Disposition header sent with the email message. 处理类型可由显示电子邮件的软件用来确定提供电子邮件附件的正确方式。The disposition type can be used by software that displays email to determine the correct way to present the email attachments. 当用户打开电子邮件时，通常会显示具有处置类型的附件。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually displayed when the user opens the email. 处理类型为的附件 通常不会打开，除非用户执行了其他一些操作，如单击表示附件的图标。Attachments with a disposition type of are usually not opened until the user performs some additional action, such as clicking an icon that represents the attachment. 内容处置标头在 RFC 2183 中进行了介绍 [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/) 。The Content-Disposition header is described in RFC 2183 available at [https://www.ietf.org](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of this property.
